thread.section_title: Veterans United Home Loans Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Veterans United Home Loans | www.veteransunited.com
thread.title: Clemon Wilkerson
thread.title_full: Veterans United Home Loans reviewed by Clemon Wilkerson

author: Clemon Wilkerson
title: Clemon Wilkerson
text: Our experience with Veterans United was the best. We had the most experience people working on our behalf. The loan specialist was/is the best ever. He made our experience very rewarding. He had the best personality ever. I would recommend Veterans United to everyone!
